search_metadata.description: Target companies and roles that match your profile - manually check these daily

your_profile_summary.unique_value: Software engineer background + QA mindset + data governance expertise
ideal_roles: QA & QC Manager (10/10 fit - like ADA)

job_boards_to_check_daily.name: LinkedIn Jobs
job_boards_to_check_daily.filters: Posted in last 24 hours, Remote or Canada/Singapore

target_companies_tier1.name: Shopify
target_companies_tier1.why_good_fit: E-commerce data platform, massive scale, product quality critical, remote-friendly
target_companies_tier1.notes: Check for 'data quality' or 'QA' roles. Strong Python/Ruby culture.

target_companies_tier1.name: Wealthsimple
target_companies_tier1.why_good_fit: FinTech, heavy compliance requirements (GDPR/SOC2), quality-first culture
target_companies_tier1.notes: Financial data = zero tolerance for errors. Your strength.

target_companies_tier1.name: TELUS Health
target_companies_tier1.why_good_fit: Healthcare tech, HIPAA compliance, proven track record on 500M healthcare records
target_companies_tier1.notes: HIPAA = your superpower. Mention 99.92% accuracy case study.

target_companies_tier1.name: Grab
target_companies_tier1.why_good_fit: Super-app with massive data, QA critical for payments/rides/food, regional leader
target_companies_tier1.notes: Asia presence (Vietnam contacts), scale similar to ADA data sources.

target_companies_tier1.name: Sea Group (Shopee)
target_companies_tier1.why_good_fit: E-commerce + gaming, ADA competitor, Shopee data quality is critical
target_companies_tier1.notes: PERFECT fit - same data sources as ADA (Shopee, Lazada competitor).

target_companies_tier2.name: Lightspeed
target_companies_tier2.why_good_fit: Retail/restaurant SaaS, point-of-sale data quality critical

target_companies_tier2.name: Clio
target_companies_tier2.why_good_fit: Legal tech, compliance-heavy, data governance important

target_companies_tier2.name: VNG Corporation
target_companies_tier2.why_good_fit: Gaming + social media, Vietnam presence (David/Frank network), data-driven

target_companies_tier2.name: Lazada
target_companies_tier2.why_good_fit: E-commerce, ADA data source, quality issues = opportunity
target_companies_tier2.notes: ADA dashboard showed Lazada data freshness issues - you can fix that!

target_companies_tier2.name: Veeva Systems
target_companies_tier2.why_good_fit: Life sciences cloud, HIPAA/FDA compliance, pharma data governance

target_companies_tier2.name: Epic Systems
target_companies_tier2.why_good_fit: EHR leader, healthcare data at massive scale, quality obsessed
target_companies_tier2.notes: Not remote, but dream company for healthcare data.

startup_hunt_criteria.weekly_goal: Find 3-5 startups, research founders, apply to 1-2 best fits

green_light_apply_immediately: Remote + Canada OR Singapore OR Vietnam
yellow_light_research_more: Senior QA (check if data or just UI)
Head of data (check size, stage, budget)

tier1_perfect_fits_like_ada.criteria: 9-10/10 skill match, warm intro OR decision maker accessible

tier2_strong_fits.criteria: 8/10 skill match, good company, clear job description

tier3_volume_plays.criteria: 7/10 skill match, quick apply, legitimate companies
tier3_volume_plays.example: Generic 'Data Engineer' roles with quality mentions

steps: 1. Check LinkedIn Jobs (new postings last 24h) - 10 min
3. Manual LinkedIn profile search (see daily_lead_research_plan.md) - 10 min
5. Apply to 1 perfect-fit job OR 2-3 good-fit jobs - Optional (if found)
example_daily_routine.output: 5 new leads in CRM, 0-3 job applications tracked
